data.title: Galpo Holao Satti - Reflection of Bengali Middle Class
data.meta_description:
Galpo Holao Satti - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Tapan Sinha was a prolific Bengali film director known for films addressing social issues and youth unrest in West Bengal during the 1960-1980s. 
2. Some of his notable films include Apanjan (1968) on unemployed youth, Saghina Mahato (1970) about a coolie who rises to fight injustice, and Ekhoni (1971) based on a novel and featuring Rabindrasangeet.
3. Later films addressed topics like an unemployed youth fighting injustice (Raja, 1975), and a gardener defending his land from an evil landlord (Bancharamer Bagan, 1980).
4. Sinha also made children's films like Safed Hathi (
